entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
